long_description: The easy-to-use REI TSA Lock and Cable secure your luggage but still allow easy access for airport security screeners. Set includes a 48 in. cable and a 3-dial resettable combination lock. Lock is recognized and accepted by the Transportation Security Administration (TSA); indicator changes from green to red if opened by a TSA agent. 3-dial combination can be set to the numbers of your choice. Durable braided stainless steel; coated cable is flexible and smooth.
short_description: The easy-to-use REI TSA Lock and Cable secure your luggage but still allow easy access for airport security screeners. Set includes a 48 in. cable and a 3-dial resettable combination lock.
